captions.text: Hi, how are you doing?! My name is "Otário" (Sucker)!
And today I'm here to give my support for the demonstrations that have taken place in recent days ...
And for those ones that are about to happen.
Finally, it seems that some people are waking up!
And it's not just about 20 cents! It's something much bigger that destroys this country ...
- Abusive taxes, high politicians' salaries, endemic corruption, poor public administration ...
Well, there are lots of problems!
Police and protesters! We're all in the same boat ...
Completely lost and destined to sink in this sea of ??incompetence, corruption and thievery!
And the worst of all is that the vast majority of the population still sleeps ...
And will only realize that this is happening when they're drowning ...
Because, those ones who are in power will be safe with their lifeboats.
Therefore, lets unite!
Because, while the population (composed by police as protestors) are fighting with each other ...
We are still paying high taxes and sustaining incompetent and corrupt politicians .
Want to make a revolution? The time has came! Lets go to the streets!
People shouldn't be afraid of their government.
Governments should be afraid of their people.
The best way to get information about the protests, is right here on Internet.
Often I'm posting videos about this subject here, at my Youtube channel...
I invite you to check my pages on facebook and twitter
facebook.com / CanalDoOtario and twitter.com / CanalDoOtario
Help to share this information and make more people wake up to reality.
Protesters! Keeps to protests peacefully ...
The only weapons that should be used are the images taken by cameras, camcorders and mobile phones.
Against this type of weapon, there is no bullet proof vests!
Police, join the population! Because you guys are defending the wrong people!
There is still time to change!
Political parties ... leave the manifestations and lower your flags!
The protests are made by the people, and not by you guys!
Do you want more?!
For those who follow the @CanalDoOtario, they knows that this subject is very discussed here ...
And it may the inspiration for many who are on the streets today!
But if you have not watched my last video about taxes ...
I think you will be amazed at the information and coincidences that are there.
Corrupt politicians ... the nightmare is just beginning!
Booooooh!
Otário A. Anonymous - @CanalDoOtario
